formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: If at least one of \(n, m\) is non-zero, then \[ \gcd(n, m)\cdot \operatorname{lcm}(n, m) = |n m|. \] Bézout’s identity states that there exist integers \(x, y\) such that \[ \gcd(n, m) = x n + y m. \]
